preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry environment, measure 6.4 g of lithium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 11.3 g of lead and 7.2 g of strontium using the same balance. 
 3. Combine all three materials in a ceramic or glass container. 
 4. Mix the powders thoroughly using a spatula or a mortar and pestle until a homogeneous blend is achieved.
